text: Assume Amazon, Google and Apple are listening to every word, grunt, angry utterance, fight with your SO, toilet flush, door opening and closing in your house through their speaker products. And remembering them. If you're not into the whole surveillance thing, unplug it, and put it away somewhere safe. I wouldn't just throw it out, I'm pretty sure it retains its ability to phone home on your behalf. Imagine what the Chinese version of these devices might do.
